column5: Hey Everyone,  i'm finally going to get a chance to get out and do some fishing. I was wondering if anyone has been or knows anyone who has had any luck in Erindale Park...I'm assuming it is still open all year round.  Let me know if you can,  Dave
It's open all year, the water has been fast and stained brown with all the rain we had have and the run off. You may want to wait until next week if the weather clears by Monday.
